Closure.Name: ROWANWOOD AVE At YONGE ST

Closure.Name: GARDINER EXPY From REES ST To JARVIS ST

Closure.Name: BLOOR ST W At AVENUE RD

Closure.Name: LAKE SHORE BLVD W At YORK ST
Closure.Description: The East and West bound South lanes will be closed on Lake Shore Boulevard West, East of York Street due to construction for streetscaping. Work will be from 9:30AM to 3:30PM on weekdays and 9:00AM to 7:00PM on Saturdays.
